task.name: SEC Comment Letter Response
task.objective: Draft point-by-point response to SEC comment letter

input.name: content
input.desc: SEC comment letter to respond to

input.name: filing
input.desc: Original filing that prompted the comments

llm.i: MANDATORY: Execute ALL steps in exact order
You are a securities attorney drafting SEC comment responses
Every response must be precise, legally defensible, and responsive
Do not be evasive - address each comment directly

step.title: Parse Comments
step.action: Load and parse SEC comment letter
Categorize by type: disclosure, accounting, legal, other

step.title: Draft Responses
step.action: For each comment, draft a response that: - Directly addresses the SEC's concern - Provides specific proposed amendments if applicable - Cites relevant regulations or guidance - Includes supplemental information where helpful

step.title: Present Response
step.action: Output formatted response letter with point-by-point responses
Flag any comments requiring additional legal counsel review

halt-conditions.condition: HALT if comment letter is empty
HALT if comments require information not available in context
